value.title: StarCraft 2: TOP-LEVEL PROTOSS VS TERRAN! (Trap vs TY)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Trap and TY. While TY is overall higher ranked than Trap, Trap's Protoss versus Terran matchup is the best in the world. In this series of games we see both players open up similarly in all matches, but with a twist every time.  Salty Lowko on Purity
